title.rendered: “IDF Intercepts Suspicious Aerial Target, Launches Counterattacks on Hezbollah’s Terror Targets in Southern Lebanon”

content.rendered:
IDF Spokesperson:

The IDF intercepted a suspicious aerial target heading towards the country’s territory; IDF forces attacked Hezbollah’s terror targets in southern Lebanon last night.

Our aerial defense fighters recently intercepted a suspicious aerial target over the nautical space in the Rosh Hanikra area, no alert was activated according to policy.

Overnight, Air Force fighter jets attacked a military building housing Hezbollah terrorists in the Ein Qura area, alongside the organization’s terrorism infrastructures in the Ramyeh and Al-Tiri areas in southern Lebanon.

IDF forces attacked with artillery the locations from which the launchings towards the Shetula area were identified last night (Tuesday).
